page.title: 10LOCAL HEADLINES
page.content: Wiltshire police were forced to close {Stonehenge}in an attempt to prevent hippies from celebrating at their Summer solstice festival. { Pollution}of South coast beaches continues to be a problem.Sewage and spillage from ships in the busy English Channel are the main causes. The four month old{teachers' dispute over pay continues and with only three weeks until the end of term a breakthrough to a solution seems unlikely. A family of six living locally have been forced to put a coach in their garden to ease the{overcrowding}in their small council home.The council have so far refused to rehouse them. Shops and stores in the centre of Bournemouth were evacuated due to {unexpected flooding}cause by sudden heavy rain.
